Kuv yuav yug puab huv lub tshaav zaub kws zoo zoo, hab puab tej tshaav zaub yog Yixayee tej roob sab. Qhov chaw ntawd puab yuav pw huv tej chaw kws muaj zaub zoo zoo, hab puab yuav nrhav noj huv tej tshaav zaub mog mog sau Yixayee tej roob.
Kuv yuav ua tug kws yug kuv cov yaaj ntaag, hab kuv yuav ca puab pw. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav.

Kuv yuav moog nrhav tug yaaj kws pluj, hab coj tug yuam kev rov lug, hab kuv muab ntaub qhwv tug kws pob txhaa luv. Kuv yuav txhawb zug rua tug kws tsaug leeg, tassws tug kws rog hab muaj zug kuv yuav muab ua kuas puam tsuaj. Kuv yuav ua ncaaj ua nceeg yug puab.

“ ‘Mej cov kws yog kuv paab yaaj paab tshws mas Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav rua mej tas, Saib maj, kuv yuav txav txem rua kuv cov maum yaaj ib tug zuj zug hab txav txem rua tej txwv tshws txwv yaaj.

Qhov kws mej noj zaub huv lub tshaav zaub kws zoo tsw txaus lov? Mej tseed tsuj pis ntag tej zaub kws tseed tshuav huv mej lub tshaav. Mej haus dej ntshab tsw txaus lov? Mej tseed xuas kwtaw du tej dej kws tseed tshuav nru taag.
Kuv cov yaaj yuav noj tej kws mej kwtaw tsuj hab haus tej dej kws mej kwtaw ua nru taag lov?
“ ‘Vem le nuav Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav rua puab tas, Saib maj, kuv, yog kuv ntaag kws yuav tu plaub rua cov yaaj kws rog hab cov kws ntxaug.
Vem mej muab xub pwg hab phaab taav xyeeb tug kws tsw muaj zug, hab xuas mej tej kub xyob puab, ua rua puab tswv rw quas sua moog,
kuv yuav cawm kuv paab yaaj paab tshws kuas dim, puab yuav tsw raug luas lws dua le lawm, kuv yuav txav txem rua cov yaaj ib tug zuj zug.
Kuv yuav tsaa ib tug yug yaaj xwb ua tug kws yug puab, yog kuv tug qhev Tavi,  mas nwg yuav yug puab. Nwg yuav yug puab hab ua puab tug yug yaaj.
Hab kuv kws yog Yawmsaub yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv, hab kuv tug qhev Tavi yuav ua puab tug thawj. Kuv yog Yawmsaub tau has ca le nuav lawm ntaag.

“ ‘Kuv yuav nrug puab sws cog lug kuas muaj kev thaaj yeeb hab yuav ntab tej tsaj nyaum tawm huv lub tebchaws, sub puab txhad tau nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua hab pw huv tej haav zoov tso sab plhuav.
Kuv yuav ua rua puab hab tej chaw kws nyob ib ncig kuv lub roob ua lub chaw kws muaj koob moov rua luas. Kuv yuav tso naag lug lawv lub caij lub nyoog, hab yuav lug tsheej kob kws muaj koob moov.

Tej txwv ntoo huv teb yuav txw txwv, hab tej aav yuav zoo qoob loos. Puab yuav nyob tso sab plhuav huv puab lub tebchaws. Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub rua thaus kuv muab puab tug quab luv hab cawm puab dim huv cov kws muab puab ua qhev txhais teg.
Puab yuav tsw raug ib tsoom tebchaws lws dua le lawm, hab tej tsaj qus huv lub tebchaws yuav tsw tum puab noj le lawm. Puab yuav nyob tso sab plhuav hab yuav tsw muaj leejtwg ua rua puab ntshai.
Kuv yuav pub tej teb kws qoob loos zoo  rua puab, sub puab txhad le tsw raug kev tshaib huv lub tebchaws dua le lawm, hab tsw raug ib tsoom tebchaws saib tsw taug le lawm.
Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv kws yog Yawmsaub, yog puab tug Vaajtswv, nrug nraim puab nyob, hab paub tas puab kws yog cov Yixayee yog kuv haiv tuabneeg. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav.
Mej yog kuv cov yaaj, yog cov yaaj kws nyob huv kuv lub tshaav zaub, hab kuv yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.’ ”
Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua kuv tas,
“Tuabneeg tug tub, ca le tsom ntsoov tawm tsaam lub roob Xe‑i hab cev Vaajtswv lug tawm tsaam nwg,

hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Lub roob Xe‑i, saib maj, kuv tawm tsaam koj, hab kuv yuav tsaa hlo kuv txhais teg tawm tsaam koj, hab kuv yuav ua rua koj raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas ca.
Kuv yuav ua rua koj tej moos lamswm taag, mas koj yuav nyob do cuas ca, mas koj txhad le paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Vem koj ua yeeb ncuab rua cov Yixayee hab cib nyeej ib txwm lug, hab muab puab cob rua nav ntaaj tug fwjchim rua thaus puab raug vej sub vej sw, yog thaus puab raug txem zag kawg.

Vem le nuav, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, Kuv yeej muaj txujsa nyob, kuv yuav npaaj koj ca raug txem lug ntshaav hab ntshaav yuav lawv cuag koj. Vem koj tsw ntxub qhov kws ua rua tuabneeg lug ntshaav, vem le nuav ntshaav txhad lawv koj qaab moog.
Kuv yuav ua rua lub roob Xe‑i raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas ca, hab kuv yuav muab cov kws moog moog lug lug txav tu nrho ntawm nwg.
Kuv yuav ua kuas sau koj tej roob muaj tuabneeg raug tua tuag puv nkaus. Cov kws raug nav ntaaj tua tuag yuav qaug rua sau koj tej pov roob hab huv koj tej kwj haa hab huv koj tej haav dej huvsw.
Kuv yuav ua rua koj nyob do cuas ca moog ib txhws, hab yuav tsw muaj tuabneeg nyob huv koj tej moos. Mas koj yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Txawm yog Yawmsaub nyob hov ntawd, los koj tseed has tas, “Ob haiv tuabneeg hab ob lub tebchaws ntawd yuav ua kuv le, hab peb yuav muab puab lug ua peb tug.”

Vem le nuav, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad has tas, Kuv yeej muaj txujsa nyob, kuv yuav ua rua koj lawv le koj txujkev chim hab lawv le koj txujkev khib kws koj ua tshwm lug vem yog koj ntxub puab. Thaus kuv txav txem rua koj, kuv yuav qha kuv rua puab  paub.
Mas koj yuav paub tas kuv kws yog Yawmsaub tau nov koj tej lug phem huvsw kws koj has saib tsw taug Yixayee tej roob has tas, “Puab raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas, puab raug muab rua peb noj lawm.”
Koj lub qhov ncauj khaav theeb heev tawm tsaam kuv, hab has tawm tsaam kuv tsw txawj taag le. Kuv tub nov lawm.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Kuv yuav ua rua koj nyob do cuas ca, sub thoob nplajteb txhad xyiv faab.

Thaus cov Yixayee tej qub txeeg qub teg nyob do cuas ca koj zoo sab xyiv faab le caag, kuv yuav ua rua koj ib yaam le ntawd. Lub roob Xe‑i hab taag nrho Entoo huvsw, mej yuav nyob do cuas ca. Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.’ ”
“Tuabneeg tug tub, koj ca le cev kuv tej lug rua Yixayee tej roob has tas, ‘Yixayee tej roob 'e, ca le noog Yawmsaub tej lug.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Vem koj cov yeeb ncuab nyos koj has tas, “Tej roob sab kws ib txwm muaj nyob poob ua peb tug lawm lauj.” ’

Vem le nuav ca le cev Vaajtswv lug has tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Vem yog puab ua rua mej nyob do cuas ca hab tsuam mej txhua faab, ua rua mej poob moog ua luas tej tebchaws teej tug, hab mej tag luas ncauj luas lu hab raug ib tsoom tuabneeg thuaj luag saib tsw taug,

Yixayee tej roob 'e, vem le nuav, ca le noog Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tej lug. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav rua tej roob hab tej pov roob, tej haav dej hab tej kwj haa, hab tej chaw kws raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas ca hab tej moos kws tsw muaj tuabneeg nyob, yog tej chaw kws raug luas lws hab raug ib tsoom tebchaws kws nyob ib ncig thuaj luag.

Vem le nuav, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Kuv khib xeeb sab kub quas lug has tej lug tawm tsaam luas tej tebchaws, hab tawm tsaam Entoo huvsw, yog tug kws zoo sab xyiv faab kawg muab kuv lub tebchaws ua nwg tug hab saib tsw taug heev kawg, sub nwg txhad tau lub tebchaws hov ua nwg tug hab lws tau huvsw moog.’

Vem le nuav ca le cev lug has txug Yixayee tebchaws hab has rua tej roob hab tej pov roob, tej haav dej hab tej kwj haa tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Saib maj, kuv has ntawm kuv txujkev khib xeeb hab npau tawg, vem mej raug ib tsoom tebchaws thuaj hab saib tsw taug.
Vem le nuav Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad has tas, kuv cog lug ruaj khov tas tej tebchaws kws nyob ib ncig ntawm mej kuj yuav raug thuaj hab raug saib tsw taug.
“ ‘Yixayee tej roob 'e, mej yuav ncau ceg nthuav hab txw txwv rua kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee, tsua qhov tsw ntev puab yuav tau rov lug.
Saib maj, kuv tuaj mej tog, kuv yuav tig rov lug rua ntawm mej, yuav muab mej laij hab muab mej cog.
Hab kuv yuav ua kuas tuabneeg fuam vaam coob rua huv mej, yog taag nrho cov Yixayee huvsw. Yuav muaj tuabneeg nyob huv tej moos, hab tej chaw kws muab tso tseg nyob do cuas yuav raug tswm dua tshab.

Kuv yuav ua kuas tsaj txhu hab tuabneeg fuam vaam coob rua huv mej, puab yuav muaj mivnyuas fuam vaam coob. Kuv yuav ua kuas muaj tuabneeg nyob huv mej ib yaam le yaav thau u, hab kuv yuav ua zoo rua mej ntau dua yaav thau u. Mas mej txhad yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.

Kuv yuav pub kuas muaj tuabneeg taug kev sau mej, yog kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee ntaag, hab puab yuav tau mej ua puab tug, hab mej yuav ua puab le qub txeeg qub teg, hab mej yuav tsw rhuav tshem puab tej mivnyuas dua le lawm.
“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Vem yog luas tej has rua mej tas, “Mej noj tuabneeg, hab mej rhuav tshem tej mivnyuas tawm huv mej lub tebchaws moog,”
vem le nuav, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, mej yuav tsw noj tuabneeg hab yuav tsw rhuav tshem tej mivnyuas tawm huv mej lub tebchaws moog dua le lawm.

Kuv yuav tsw pub kuas mej tau nov ib tsoom tebchaws tej lug thuaj luag dua le lawm, hab mej yuav tsw txaaj muag rua ib tsoom tuabneeg dua le lawm, hab mej yuav tsw ua rua mej lub tebchaws dawm le lawm. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.’ ”
Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua kuv tas,

“Tuabneeg tug tub, thaus cov Yixayee nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, puab lub neej hab tej kws puab ua, qas puag tsuas lub tebchaws. Tej kws puab ua, kuv saib mas qas tsw huv ib yaam le tej quaspuj kws tseed ua quaspuj lawv lub caij qas tsw huv.
Vem le nuav kuv txhad nchuav kuv txujkev npau tawg lug vem yog tim tej ntshaav kws puab tua lug rua huv lub tebchaws, hab tim tej txoov daab kws puab ua qas puag tsuas lub tebchaws.
Kuv txhad ua rua puab tswv rw quas sua moog rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, hab puab raug muab lawv moog rua luas tej tebchaws. Kuv txav txem rua puab lawv le puab lub neej hab tej kws puab ua.

Tassws thaus puab moog rua huv luas tej tebchaws, tsw has lub tebchaws twg, puab tau ua puag tsuas kuv lub npe kws dawb huv, tsua qhov tej tuabneeg pheej has txug puab tas, ‘Cov tuabneeg nuav yog Yawmsaub haiv tuabneeg lov? Txawm yog le ntawd los puab raug tawm huv nwg lub tebchaws.’
Tassws kuv txhawj txug kuv lub npe kws dawb huv, kws cov Yixayee muab ua puag tsuas rua huv tej tebchaws kws puab moog txug.

“Vem le nuav, koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Cov Yixayee 'e, tej kws kuv saamswm yuav ua nuav tsw yog saib rua mej, tassws yog saib rua kuv lub npe kws dawb huv, kws mej tau muab ua puag tsuas rua huv tej tebchaws kws mej moog txug ntawd.

Kuv yuav ua kuv lub npe luj kawg qhov kws dawb huv tshwm lug, yog kuv lub npe kws raug muab ua qas puag tsuas rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, tub yog mej ua qas puag tsuas huv plawv puab. Mas ib tsoom tebchaws yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub rua thaus kuv ua kuv txujkev dawb huv tshwm rua huv mej rua puab pum.
“ ‘Kuv yuav coj mej tawm huv ib tsoom tebchaws hab sau zog mej huv txhua lub tebchaws lug, hab coj mej rov lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws yog mej le ntaag.
Kuv yuav muab cov dej huv nchus rua mej, mej txhad le huv ntawm qhov kws mej qas tsw huv, hab kuv yuav ntxuav kuas mej huv ntawm qhov kws mej pe tej txoov daab huvsw.
Kuv yuav pub lub sab tshab rua mej hab pub tug ntsuj plig tshab rua mej. Kuv yuav muab lub sab pob zeb rhu huv mej lub cev moog hab muab lub sab nqaj rua mej.
Kuv yuav muab kuv tug ntsuj plig rua huv mej, hab kuv yuav ua kuas mej ua lawv le kuv tej kaab ke hab ua tuab zoo coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai.
Mej yuav tau nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab pub rua mej tej laug. Mej yuav ua kuv haiv tuabneeg, hab kuv yuav ua mej tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv yuav cawm mej dim mej tej kev qas tsw huv. Kuv yuav hu kuas muaj qoob loos nplua quas mag rua mej hab tsw kheev mej raug kev tshaib nqhes dua le lawm.
Kuv yuav ua kuas tej ntoo huv teb txw txwv ntau hab ua rua tej teb tau qoob loos nplua quas mag, sub mej txhad tsw raug txaaj muag rua ib tsoom tebchaws vem yog qhov kws muaj kev tshaib nqhes.
“ ‘Mej yuav ncu txug mej tej kev phem, hab ncu txug tej kws mej ua tsw zoo, mas mej yuav ntxub mej tug kheej vem yog mej tej kev txhum hab mej tej kev qas vuab tsuab.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, qhov kws kuv yuav ua le ntawd tsw yog saib rua mej. Mej ca le paub tseeb qhov ntawd. Cov Yixayee 'e, mej ca le txaaj muag hab poob ntsej muag rua tej kws mej ua.

“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Nub kws kuv ntxuav mej kev txhum pluj taag huvsw ntawd, kuv yuav ua kuas muaj tuabneeg nyob huv tej moos, hab tej chaw kws muab tso tseg nyob do cuas yuav muab tswm dua tshab.
Hab yuav laij tej teb kws muab tso tseg nyob do cuas, yuav tsw nyob do cuas rua txhua tug kws dua kev pum.

Luas yuav has tas, “Lub tebchaws kws muab tso tseg nuav zoo yaam nkaus le lub vaaj Etee lawm, tej moos kws raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas hab pob taag, nwgnuav muaj tuabneeg nyob hab muaj ntsaa loog lawm.”

Mas tej tebchaws kws tshuav nyob ib ncig mej yuav paub tas kuv kws yog Yawmsaub tau tswm tej chaw kws pob taag nuav dua tshab hab cog qoob loos rua tej teb kws nyob do cuas dua tshab. Kuv kws yog Yawmsaub tau has ca le nuav lawm, hab kuv yuav ua le ntawd.’
“Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Kuv yuav kheev cov Yixayee thov kuv ua yaam nuav, yog thov pub kuas tuabneeg fuam vaam coob ib yaam le yaaj hab tshws.

Tej paab yaaj paab tshws kws swv ua kevcai tua xyeem, yog tej paab yaaj paab tshws huv Yeluxalee rua thaus ua kevcai lawv swjhawm coob npaum le caag, mas tej moos kws raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas yuav muaj tej paab tuabneeg nyob coob puv nkaus ib yaam le ntawd. Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.”
Yawmsaub txhais teg lug nyob rua sau kuv, mas Yawmsaub tug ntsuj plig coj kuv tawm lug, coj kuv moog tso rua huv ib lub haav, muaj pob txhaa puv nkaus.
Nwg coj kuv moog saib thoob plhawv cov pob txhaa hov, na cav muaj pob txhaa huv lub haav hov ntau kawg le, hab tej pob txhaa hov qhuav nkig nkuav.
Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, tej pob txhaa nuav yuav caj taug sav los tsw taug?” Mas kuv teb tas, “Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj txhad yog tug kws paub xwb.”
Nwg has dua rua kuv tas, “Ca le cev Vaajtswv lug rua tej pob txhaa nuav, hab has rua tej pob txhaa tas, ‘Cov pob txhaa qhuav 'e, mej ca le noog Yawmsaub tej lug.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav rua cov pob txhaa tas, Kuv yuav tso paa txeem rua huv mej mas mej yuav caj sa.
Kuv yuav muab leeg lug tso rua sau mej, hab ua kuas muaj nqaj sau mej, hab muab tawv lug qhwv mej, hab tso paa rua huv mej, mas mej yuav caj sa. Tes mej yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.’ ”
Kuv kuj cev Vaajtswv tej lug lawv le nwg has rua kuv. Thaus kuv saamswm cev lug hov, muaj ib lub suab nrov, yog lub suab ndij ndawj, hab tej pob txhaa hov txaav lug sws txuas nyag le rua nyag.
Thaus kuv saib quas ntsoov txawm muaj leeg hlaav tuaj rua sau cov pob txhaa, hab muab nqaj lug rua sau hab muaj tawv lug qhwv tej pob txhaa. Tassws tsw muaj paa rua huv.

Mas Yawmsaub has rua kuv tas, “Ca le cev Vaajtswv lug rua paa,  tuabneeg tug tub, ca le cev los maj, hab has rua paa tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Tug paa 'e, ca le lug ntawm plaub faab cua lug hab tshuab paa rua huv cov tuabneeg kws raug tua tuag nuav sub puab txhad le caj sa.’ ”
Kuv txhad le cev Vaajtswv lug lawv le kws nwg has rua kuv, mas paa kuj nkaag rua huv puab hab puab kuj caj sa, hab puab sawv tseeg, ua ib paab tub rog coob coob.
Mas Yawmsaub has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, cov pob txhaa nuav yog cov Yixayee huvsw. Puab has tas, ‘Peb tej pob txhaa qhuav nkig nkuav, peb tsw muaj chaw vaam lawm, peb raug muab txav tu nrho.’

Yog le nuav, ca le cev Vaajtswv lug hab has rua puab tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Saib maj, kuv haiv tuabneeg 'e, kuv yuav qheb mej tej qhov ntxaa hab tsaa mej tawm huv mej tej qhov ntxaa lug hab yuav coj mej rov lug rua huv Yixayee tebchaws.
Kuv haiv tuabneeg 'e, thaus kuv qheb mej tej qhov ntxaa hab tsaa mej sawv tawm huv mej tej qhov ntxaa lug mas mej yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.

Hab kuv yuav muab kuv tug ntsuj plig rua huv mej, hab mej yuav caj sa, hab kuv yuav muab mej txawb rua huv mej lub tebchaws. Mas mej txhad le paub tas kuv kws yog Yawmsaub tau has tseg hab tau ua lawv le ntawd. Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.’ ”
Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua kuv tas,

“Tuabneeg tug tub, koj muab ib tog ntoo lug hab sau rua huv tas, ‘Yuta le hab cov Yixayee kws koom Yuta le.’ Hab muab dua ib tog ntoo lug sau rua huv tas, ‘Efa‑i le, yog Yauxej hab cov Yixayee kws koom Yauxej le.’
Muab ob tog ntoo lug ua ke ua ib tog, sub txhad tuav tau ua ib tog huv koj txhais teg.
Mas thaus koj haiv tuabneeg has rua koj tas, ‘Koj yuav tsw qha rua peb paub tas ob tog ntoo nuav lub ntsab yog daabtsw lov?’

koj ca le has rua puab tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Saib maj, kuv saamswm yuav muab Yauxej hab cov Yixayee kws koom Yauxej tog ntoo kws nyob huv Efa‑i txhais teg, hab muab Yuta tog ntoo lug koom ua ke, hab muab ob tog lug ua ke, sub txhad tuav tau ua ib tog rua huv kuv txhais teg.’
Thaus ob tog ntoo kws koj sau hov nyob huv koj txhais teg taab meeg puab,

mas ca le has rua puab tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Saib maj, kuv yuav coj cov Yixayee tawm huv ib tsoom tebchaws kws puab moog nyob lawm lug, hab yuav sau zog puab huv txhua faab lug hab coj puab lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws yeej yog puab le.

Hab kuv yuav ua kuas puab koom ua ib haiv tuabneeg rua huv lub tebchaws xwb, yog sau Yixayee tej roob. Hab yuav muaj tuab tug vaajntxwv kaav puab suavdawg. Puab yuav tsw ua ob haiv tuabneeg dua le lawm, hab tsw faib ua ob lub tebchaws dua le lawm.

Puab yuav tsw ua rua puab qas puag tsuas ntawm qhov kws pe puab tej txoov daab hab ntawm puab tej hov txhua chaw kws ntxub kawg hab ntawm puab tej kev faav xeeb dua le lawm. Tassws kuv yuav cawm puab dim qhov kws puab faav xeeb ua txhum muaj txem, hab yuav ntxuav puab kuas huv. Mas puab yuav ua kuv haiv tuabneeg hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv.
“ ‘Kuv tug qhev Tavi yuav ua vaajntxwv kaav puab, hab puab yuav muaj tuab tug yug yaaj xwb. Puab yuav ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab ua tuab zoo coj lawv le kuv tej kaab ke.

Puab yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej tej laug nyob kws kuv muab pub rua kuv tug qhev Yakhauj. Puab hab puab cov mivnyuas hab tej mivnyuas hov le tub ki yuav nyob hov ntawd moog ib txhws. Kuv tug qhev Tavi yuav ua puab tug thawj moog ib txhws.

Kuv yuav nrug puab sws cog lug kuas muaj kev thaaj yeeb, hab tej lug cog tseg hov yuav nyob moog ib txhws. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua puab hab ua kuas puab fuam vaam coob, hab kuv yuav txawb lub chaw kws pe kuv rua huv plawv puab moog ib txhws.
Kuv lub chaw nyob yuav nyob huv puab. Kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv hab puab yuav ua kuv haiv tuabneeg.
Mas ib tsoom tebchaws yuav paub tas kuv kws yog Yawmsaub muab cov Yixayee cais ua cov kws dawb huv rua thaus lub chaw kws pe kuv nyob huv plawv puab moog ib txhws.’ ”
Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua kuv tas,
“Tuabneeg tug tub, ca le tsom ntsoov rua vaajntxwv Kau huv Makau tebchaws, nwg yog lub moos Mese hab lub moos Thunpaa le thawj, mas ca le cev Vaajtswv lug tawm tsaam nwg,
hab has tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Saib maj, Kau 'e, koj yog Mese hab Thunpaa le thawj, kuv tawm tsaam koj.

Kuv yuav ua rua koj tig rov qaab hab yuav muab nqai lauj nqai koj lub qhov ncauj, kuv yuav caab koj hab koj tej tub rog huvsw hab tej neeg hab tej tub rog caij neeg tawm moog. Suavdawg puavleej naav rwg tsho ua rog txhwj zog, ua ib paab tub rog coob heev, txhua tug muaj daim hlau luj kws tiv thaiv hab daim hlau miv, hab tuav rawv ntaaj.
Pawxia hab Khuj hab Phuj tuaj koj tog, txhua tug muaj daim hlau thaiv hab ntoo mom hlau,
hab muaj Kaumaw hab nwg paab tub rog huvsw, hab Npe Thaukama kws tuaj saab peg kawg nkaus nrug nwg paab tub rog huvsw tuaj. Muaj ntau haiv tuabneeg tuaj koj tog.
“ ‘Koj hab tej paab tub rog huvsw kws tuaj koom nrug koj ua ke, ca le npaaj hab npaaj kuas txhwj txhua lub swjhawm, hab koj ca le ua tug kws faaj xwm rua puab.

Thaus dhau ntau nub lawm kuv yuav kuas koj tawm moog. Yaav tom qaab koj yuav moog tawm tsaam lub tebchaws kws tub txeev ua rog kws rov nyob tug lawm, yog lub tebchaws kws tej tuabneeg sau quas nthwv huv ntau lub tebchaws lug nyob sau Yixayee tej roob, yog tej chaw kws tub txeev muab tso tseg nyob do cuas ntev lug lawm. Cov pejxeem huv lub tebchaws hov raug coj tawm huv ib tsoom tebchaws lug, tassws nwgnuav puab suavdawg nyob tso sab plhuav lawm.
Koj yuav tawm moog zuj zug yaam le cua daaj cua dub. Koj yuav zoo yaam nkaus le tauv fuab kws laum nkaus lub tebchaws, yog koj hab koj tej paab tub rog huvsw hab ntau haiv tuabneeg kws koom nrug koj.
“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Nub ntawd koj yuav xaav huv koj lub sab hab yuav ntaus tswvyim phem,

hab has tas, “Kuv yuav moog ntaus rog rua lub tebchaws kws tej zej zog tsw muaj ntsaa loog. Kuv yuav ntaus haiv tuabneeg kws nyob thaaj yeeb hab tso sab plhuav, txhua tug nyob tsw muaj ntsaa loog thaiv tsw muaj rooj loog tsw muaj laag rooj.

Kuv yuav txeeb hab lws tej hov txhua chaw coj moog, hab ua rog rua tej chaw kws tub muab tso tseg nyob do cuas kuas nwgnuav muaj tuabneeg nyob huv lawm, hab ua rog rua tej tuabneeg kws sau huv ib tsoom tebchaws lug, yog cov kws tau tsaj txhu hov txhua chaw kws nyob huv plawv nplajteb.”

“ ‘Cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Senpa hab lub moos Ntentaa hab cov tub laag tub luam huv Thasi hab huv Thasi tej zej zog yuav has rua koj tas, “Koj tuaj txeeb hov txhua chaw lov? Koj txhwj koj tej paab tub rog tuaj lws, tuaj coj tej nyaj tej kub tej tsaj txhu hab tej hov txhua chaw moog hab txeeb tau ntau kawg le lov?” ’
“Yog le nuav, tuabneeg tug tub, ca le cev Vaajtswv lug hab has rua Kau tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Nub kws kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee nyob tso sab plhuav lawm, koj tsw paub lov?
Koj yuav tuaj ntawm koj lub chaw kws nyob saab peg kawg nkaus tuaj, koj hab ntau haiv tuabneeg kws koom nrug koj, txhua tug caij neeg, ua ib paab tub rog coob heev hab muaj zug heev.

Koj yuav tuaj ua rog rua kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee ib yaam le tauv fuab laum nkaus lub tebchaws. Yaav tom qaab kuv yuav coj koj tuaj ua rog rua kuv lub tebchaws. Kau 'e, thaus kuv swv koj ua kuv txujkev dawb huv tshwm lug taab meeg ib tsoom tebchaws, mas puab txhad le paub kuv.

“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Koj yog tug kws yaav thau u kuv kuas kuv cov tub qhe kws cev lug rua cov Yixayee has txug los tsw yog? Puab cev kuv le lug ntau xyoo tas kuv yuav coj koj lug tawm tsaam puab.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, Nub ntawd kws Kau tuaj ua rog rua Yixayee tebchaws, kuv yuav npau tawg heev.
Vem kuv khib xeeb hab npau tawg ceev kuv txhad has tawv tas, Nub ntawd aav yuav tseeg quas nkawg heev huv Yixayee tebchaws.

Tej ntseg huv havtxwv hab tej noog sau nruab ntug, hab tej tsaj nyeg tsaj qus, hab tej kws nkaag huv aav huvsw hab tej tuabneeg suavdawg huv nplajteb yuav tshee quas nyo rua thaus kuv lug. Tej roob yuav pob taag, tej roob tsuas yuav nphau, hab txhua lub ntsaa loog yuav qaug taag.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, Kuv yuav hu raab ntaaj tuaj tawm tsaam Kau sau kuv tej roob huvsw, Kau puab txhua tug raab ntaaj yuav rov tawm tsaam puab cov kwvtij.

Kuv yuav tso mob kis hab sub tawg sub ntshaa txav txem rua nwg, hab kuv yuav tso naag xub naag cua hab lawg hab suavtawg hab lawj faaj lug raug nwg hab nwg tej paab tub rog hab ntau haiv tuabneeg kws koom nrug nwg.
Ua le nuav mas kuv txhad ua kuv tug fwjchim hab kuv txujkev dawb huv tshwm lug, txhad qha kuv rua ntau lub tebchaws pum. Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.’ ”
“Tuabneeg tug tub, koj ca le cev Vaajtswv lug tawm tsaam Kau has tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Kau 'e, koj yog Mese hab Thunpaa tug thawj, kuv tawm tsaam koj.
Kuv yuav ua rua koj tig rov qaab hab muab koj lawv moog, hab coj koj tuaj saab peg kawg nkaus tuaj, hab coj moog tawm tsaam Yixayee tej roob.
Mas kuv yuav ntaus koj raab neev kuas poob ntawm koj saab teg txhum phem, hab ua rua koj cov xub poob ntawm koj saab teg xws.
Koj yuav tuag rua sau Yixayee tej roob, koj hab koj tej paab tub rog huvsw hab tej haiv tuabneeg kws koom nrug koj yuav tuag. Kuv yuav muab koj rua txhua yaam daav hab tsaj qus noj.
Koj yuav tuag rua tom tej teb, tsua qhov kuv has ca lawm. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
Kuv yuav tso nplaim tawg lug raug Makau tebchaws hab raug cov kws nyob tso sab plhuav ntawm ntug havtxwv. Mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub.

“ ‘Kuv yuav ua kuv lub npe dawb huv rua puab paub rua huv plawv kuv haiv tuabneeg Yixayee, hab kuv yuav tsw kheev kuv lub npe kws dawb huv raug muab ua qas puag tsuas dua le lawm. Mas ib tsoom tebchaws yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog tug Dawb Huv rua huv cov Yixayee.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, Saib maj, nub ntawd saamswm lug, yuav lug tag tag le. Nuav yog nub kws kuv tub has ca lawm.

Mas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv Yixayee tej moos yuav tawm moog hab muab puab tej cuab yeej ua rog hlawv yog tej daim hlau luj hab daim miv kws tiv thaiv, tej neev hab tej xub, tej muv ntev hab tej muv kws laim nkaug, los puab yuav muab lug ua tawg rauv txaus xyaa xyoo.

Vem le nuav tsw txug puab txav tawg tom teb lossws tom haav zoov, tsua qhov puab yuav muab tej cuab yeej ua tawg rauv. Puab yuav txeeb ntawm cov kws txeeb puab le moog lawm rov lug, hab yuav lws ntawm cov kws lws puab le lawm. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.

“ ‘Nub ntawd kuv yuav pub Kau muaj toj ntxaas rua huv Yixayee tebchaws, yog ntawm lub haav kws tuabneeg moog moog lug lug kws nyob ntawm havtxwv Tuag saab nub tuaj, yuav ua chaw thaiv cov kws moog moog lug lug kev vem yog muab Kau hab nwg cov tuabneeg coob coob huvsw log rua hov ntawd. Luas yuav hu tas lub haav Hamookau.
Cov Yixayee yuav muab puab cov ntawd log xyaa lub hli txhad le ntxuav tau lub tebchaws kuas huv.
Txhua tug huv lub tebchaws yuav muab puab cov ntawd log. Puab ua le ntawd puab txhad yuav tau koob meej rua nub kws kuv ua kuv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm lug. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.

Puab yuav tsaa ib co tuabneeg moog moog lug lug thoob plawg huv lub tebchaws tsw tu le, hab muab cov tuag kws tseed tshuav nyob sau npoo aav log, sub txhad ntxuav tau lub tebchaws kuas huv. Dhau xyaa lub hli ntawd lawm puab le moog nrhav.

Thaus cov tuabneeg hov moog nrhav thoob plawg lub tebchaws yog leejtwg pum pob txhaa tuabneeg, nwg yuav rhais phua rua ntawm cov pob txhaa, mas cov kws log yuav tuaj muab coj moog log rua huv lub haav Hamookau.
(Ib lub moos hu ua Hamauna kuj nyob hov ntawd.) Puab yuav ntxuav lub tebchaws kuas huv le nuav.’

“Tuabneeg tug tub, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Ca le has rua txhua yaam naag noog hab tej tsaj qus huvsw tas, ‘Ca le sau zog tuaj ua ke, ca le tuaj txhua qhov tuaj, tuaj noj tej kws muab tua xyeem kws kuv saamswm npaaj rua mej, yuav noj haus tej kws muab xyeem sau Yixayee tej roob, mej yuav noj nqaj hab haus ntshaav.

Mej yuav noj cov kws sab luj sab tuab le nqaj hab haus cov thawj huv nplajteb le ntshaav, ib yaam le noj tej txwv yaaj tej mivnyuas yaaj hab tej tshws tej txwv nyuj, kws puavleej yog tsaj rog rog huv Npasaa tebchaws.
Mej yuav noj roj kuas tsau npo hab haus ntshaav kuas qaug rua thaus kws mej noj haus tej kws muab xyeem yog tej kws kuv npaaj rua mej.
Mej yuav noj nqaj neeg hab cov kws caij neeg hab tej kws sab luj sab tuab hab txhua yaam tub rog tsau npo rua ntawm kuv rooj mov.’ Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
“Kuv yuav ua rua kuv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua huv ib tsoom tebchaws, hab txhua lub tebchaws yuav pum tej kws kuv txav txem rua puab hab pum kuv txhais teg kws ntaus puab.
Txwj nub ntawd moog cov Yixayee yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv.

Mas ib tsoom tebchaws yuav paub tas cov Yixayee raug muab nteg coj moog poob tebchaws vem yog tim puab tej kev phem. Yog vem puab faav xeeb rua kuv, kuv txhad fee plhu ntawm puab hab muab puab cob rua huv cov yeeb ncuab txhais teg, hab puab suavdawg raug nav ntaaj nav rag tuag.
Kuv ua rua puab lawv le puab tej kev phem kev qas hab lawv le puab tej kev faav xeeb, hab kuv fee plhu ntawm puab.
“Yog le nuav Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Nwgnuav kuv yuav ua rua Yakhauj rov vaam meej le qub, hab kuv yuav khuvleej cov Yixayee huvsw, hab kuv yuav khib xeeb kuv lub npe kws dawb huv.

Thaus puab nyob tso sab plhuav huv puab lub tebchaws tsw muaj leejtwg ua rua puab ntshai, mas puab yuav tsw ncu qhov kws puab raug txaaj muag hab tsw ncu txhua yaam kws puab ua faav xeeb rua kuv lawm.
Thaus kuv tau coj puab tawm huv ib tsoom tuabneeg lug hab tau sau zog huv puab tej yeeb ncuab tebchaws lug, hab thaus kuv ua kuv txujkev dawb huv tshwm rua huv puab rua ntau lub tebchaws pum,

mas puab yuav paub tas kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv, tsua qhov kuv lawv puab poob moog nyob rua huv plawv ib tsoom tebchaws, hab sau puab rov lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws lawm. Kuv yuav tsw tso puab ib tug tseg rua huv tej tebchaws kws puab moog nyob ntawd dua le lawm.
Hab thaus kuv laub kuv tug Ntsuj Plig rua sau cov Yixayee, kuv yuav tsw fee plhu ntawm puab dua le lawm. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.”

Thaus peb poob tebchaws tau neeg nkaum tswb xyoos, nub xab kaum lub hauv xyoo, yog thaus Yeluxalee poob tau kaum plaub xyoos lawm, mas nub hov ntaag Yawmsaub txhais teg lug rua sau kuv, hab coj kuv moog hov ntawd.
Mas nwg coj kuv huv Vaajtswv zaaj yug quas toog lug txug Yixayee tebchaws, hab muab kuv tso rua sau ib lub roob sab heev. Ncaaj ntawm kuv rua saab nraag muaj ib lub chaw zoo le lub nroog.

Thaus nwg coj kuv lug txug lub chaw ntawd, na cav muaj ib tug txwvneej, saib mas zoo le tooj lab, muaj ib txuj hlua maaj hab ib tug paas ntsuag nyob huv nwg txhais teg. Nwg sawv nreg nreeg ntawm rooj loog.

Tug txwvneej hov has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, koj ca le tsaa muag saib hab tig ntsej noog, muab lub sab rau rua txhua yaam kws kuv yuav qha rua koj, vem tas qhov kws coj koj tuaj ntawm nuav kuj yog yuav qha rua koj. Txhua yaam kws koj pum nuav ca le pav rua cov Yixayee.”

Kuv saib na cav muaj ntsaa loog vej hlo lub tuam tsev. Tug paas ntsuag kws nyob huv tug txwvneej hov txhais teg ntev rau tshwm, txhua tshwm yog ib tshwm hab ib dus. Nwg txhad ntsuag lub ntsaa loog qhov kws tuab mas tuab ib paas, hab qhov kws sab kuj yog sab ib paas.
Mas nwg nkaag moog rua huv lub rooj loog kws tig rua saab nub tuaj. Nwg nce tug ntaiv moog hab nwg ntsuag lub paws rooj tuab ib paas.

Nwg ntsuag tej chaav zuv khuav, ib chaa ntev ib paas daav ib paas xwm faab xwm meem, qhov kws kem ib chaa zuv khuav rua ib chaa yog ntev tswb tshwm. Hab lub paws rooj tom kawg zaaj qaab khaav kuj tuab ib paas.
Nwg ntsuag lub rooj loog zaaj qaab khaav daav yim tshwm.
Ob tug puab rooj ntawm zaaj qaab khaav daav ob tshwm xwm faab xwm meem. Nuav yog lub rooj loog zaaj qaab khaav saab huv.
Ob saab kev ntawm rooj loog saab nub tuaj muaj chaav zuv khuav, ib saab muaj peb chaav sws luag zog, hab tej ncej kws nyob ob saab sws luag zog hab.
Nwg ntsuag lub paws rooj qhov daav kaum tshwm, hab txujkev huv lub rooj loog daav kaum peb tshwm.
Tej chaav zuv khuav ntawm xubndag xov sab ib tshwm tuab ib tshwm, tej chaav zuv khuav ntawd daav rau tshwm xwm faab xwm meem.

Nwg ntsuag qhov daav ntawm chaav zuv khuav saab nraus qaum moog rua chaav kws sws ncaag saab nraus qaum mas muaj neeg nkaum tswb tshwm, yog ntsuag ntawm ib lub qhov rooj miv moog rua chaav sws ncaag lub qhov rooj miv.
Nwg ntsuag zaaj qaab khaav qhov ntev muaj neeg nkaum tshwm,  nwg ntsuag moog rua tej puab rooj kws saib rua huv lub tshaav puam.
Ntsuag ntawm lub rooj loog saab nrau moog txug zaaj qaab khaav saab huv muaj tswb caug tshwm.

Lub rooj loog muaj qhov rais puag ncig, tej qhov rais huv tej chaav zuv khuav mas ua nqaim quas zug moog rua tug puab qhov rais saab nrau. Zaaj qaab khaav kuj muaj qhov rais ib yaam nkaus, hab luas sais tej tsob toov laaj rua tej ncej puab rooj.
Nwg coj kuv tawm lug rua huv lub tshaav puam saab nrau, ua cav muaj ntau chaav hab pua laag zeb puag ncig lub tshaav puam. Muaj peb caug chaav tig ndag rua ntawm txujkev kws pua laag zeb.
Cov laag zeb hov pua taug txujkev kws npuas cov rooj loog, pua thoob plawg qhov kws muaj rooj loog. Nuav yog cov laag zeb kws pua txheej kev qeg.
Mas nwg ntsuag ntawm lub rooj loog kws nyob txheej qeg moog txug lub qhov rooj kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv, muaj ib puas tshwm, saab peg hab saab nub tuaj ntev ib yaam nkaus.
Lub rooj loog ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau kws tig rua saab peg, nwg kuj ntsuag qhov ntev hab qhov daav.

Lub rooj loog ib saab muaj peb chaav zuv khuav, mas tej puab rooj hab tej chaw kem ib chaa rua ib chaa luj sws luag zog ib yaam le thawj lub rooj loog, qhov ntev muaj tswb caug tshwm, qhov daav muaj neeg nkaum tswb tshwm.
Tej qhov rais hab zaaj qaab khaav hab tej tsob toov laaj kws sais zoo ib yaam nkaus le lub rooj loog kws tig rua saab nub tuaj. Muaj xyaa qaib ntai nce moog txug hab zaaj qaab khaav nyob saab huv.

Ncaaj rua lub rooj loog saab peg muaj ib lub qhov rooj nkaag moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv ib yaam le lub rooj loog saab nub tuaj. Nwg ntsuag ntawm lub rooj loog moog txug lub qhov rooj hov muaj ib puas tshwm.
Nwg coj kuv moog rua saab nraag na cav muaj ib lub rooj loog saab nraag. Nwg ntsuag tej puab rooj hab zaaj qaab khaav kuj luj sws luag le lwm lub.
Muaj qhov rais puag ncig rooj loog hab zaaj qaab khaav ib yaam le lwm lub qhov rais, ntev tswb caug tshwm, daav neeg nkaum tswb tshwm.
Muaj xyaa qaib ntai nce moog txug hab zaaj qaab khaav nyob saab huv, sais tsob toov laaj rua ob tug puab rooj ib saab ib tsob.
Hab muaj ib lub qhov rooj saab nraag kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv. Nwg ntsuag ntawm lub qhov rooj moog txug lub rooj loog saab nraag muaj ib puas tshwm.
Mas nwg coj kuv nkaag lub qhov rooj saab nraag lug rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv. Nwg ntsuag lub qhov rooj saab nraag kuj luj sws luag le lwm lub rooj loog.
Tej chaav zuv khuav hab tej puab rooj hab zaaj qaab khaav kuj luj sws luag le lwm lub. Muaj qhov rais puag ncig lub qhov rooj hab zaaj qaab khaav, ntev tswb caug tshwm, daav neeg nkaum tswb tshwm.
[Muaj qaab khaav puag ncig ntev neeg nkaum tswb tshwm daav tswb tshwm.]
Zaaj qaab khaav tig rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau, hab sais tsob toov laaj rua tej puab rooj, hab muaj yim qaib ntai nce moog txug.
Hab nwg coj kuv lug rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv kws yog saab nub tuaj, hab nwg ntsuag lub qhov rooj, kuj luj sws luag ib yaam le lwm lub.
Tej chaav zuv khuav hab tej puab rooj hab zaaj qaab khaav kuj luj sws luag le lwm lub. Lub qhov rooj hab zaaj qaab khaav, ntev tswb caug tshwm, daav neeg nkaum tswb tshwm, muaj qhov rais puag ncig.
Zaaj qaab khaav tig rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau, hab sais tsob toov laaj rua tej puab rooj ib saab ib tsob, hab muaj yim qaib ntai nce moog txug.
Hab nwg coj kuv lug rua lub qhov rooj saab peg hab muab ntsuag, mas kuj luj sws luag le lwm lub.
Tej chaav zuv khuav hab tej puab rooj hab zaaj qaab khaav kuj luj sws luag le lwm lub. Muaj qhov rais puag ncig, ntev tswb caug tshwm, daav neeg nkaum tswb tshwm.
Zaaj qaab khaav tig rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau, hab sais tsob toov laaj rua ob tug puab rooj, ib saab ib tsob, hab muaj yim qaib ntai.
Muaj ib chaav kws nkaag ntawm zaaj qaab khaav lub qhov rooj rua huv, yog lub chaw kws ntxuav tej tsaj kws yuav hlawv xyeem.

Ntawm zaaj qaab khaav kws yuav nkaag rua huv lub qhov rooj muaj ob lub rooj txawb ib saab kev, ob lub txawb ib saab kev ca tua tej tsaj kws yuav hlawv xyeem hab xyeem daws txem hab xyeem ntxuav kev txaug kev txhum.
Lub qhov rooj saab peg zaaj qaab khaav saab nrau muaj ob lub rooj txawb ib saab kev, ob lub rooj txawb ib saab kev.
Muaj plaub lub rooj nyob saab qhov rooj huv, muaj plaub lub nyob saab qhov rooj nrau, huvsw yim lub, yog puab swv tua tej tsaj kws yuav xyeem.

Muaj plaub lub rooj kws txaug pob zeb ua swv tua tsaj hlawv xyeem, ntev ib tshwm txhais daav ib tshwm txhais sab ib tshwm, muab tej cuab yeej kws tua tej tsaj xyeem hab tej tsaj hlawv xyeem tso rua sau.
Muaj nqai lauj ntev ib dus dai puag ncig tej phaab ntsaa ntawm lub rooj.  Yuav muab tej nqaj kws xyeem tso rua sau tej rooj ntawd.

Mas nwg coj kuv moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv, ua cav muaj ob chaav huv lub tshaav puam saab huv, ib chaav nyob ntawm ib saab lub qhov rooj saab peg tig rua saab nraag, hab ib chaav nyob ntawm ib saab lub qhov rooj saab nraag tig rua saab peg.
Mas nwg has rua kuv tas, “Chaav kws tig rua saab nraag yog cov pov thawj kws saib lub tuam tsev chaav,
chaav kws tig rua saab peg yog cov pov thawj kws saib lub thaaj xyeem chaav. Cov pov thawj nuav yog Xantau caaj ceg, huv xeem Levi mas tuab cov nuav yog cov kws tuaj ze Yawmsaub ua koom tau rua nwg.”
Mas nwg ntsuag lub tshaav puam hov ntev ib puas tshwm daav ib puas tshwm xwm faab xwm meem, hab lub thaaj xyeem nyob ntawm lub tuam tsev hauv ntej.

Hab nwg coj kuv moog txug ntawm lub tuam tsev zaaj qaab khaav hab nwg ntsuag ob saab puab rooj, ib saab phaab ntsaa ntawm qhov rooj daav tswb tshwm, hab lub qhov rooj daav kaum plaub tshwm, ib saab puab rooj tuab peb tshwm.
Zaaj qaab khaav ntev neeg nkaum tshwm daav kaum ob tshwm. Muaj kaum qaib ntai nce moog txug hab muaj ob tug ncej qaab khaav nyob ob saab puab rooj.
Mas nwg coj kuv moog rua huv chaav dawb huv. Nwg ntsuag ob saab puab rooj, ib saab daav rau tshwm,
lub qhov rooj daav kaum tshwm, ib saab phaab ntsaa ntawm qhov rooj daav tswb tshwm, hab nwg ntsuag chaav dawb huv ntev plaub caug tshwm daav neeg nkaum tshwm.
Nwg nkaag rua chaav saab huv mas nwg ntsuag ob saab puab rooj, ib saab daav ob tshwm, lub qhov rooj daav rau tshwm, ib saab phaab ntsaa ntawm qhov rooj daav xyaa tshwm.

Hab nwg ntsuag chaav ntawd qhov ntev neeg nkaum tshwm hab qhov daav neeg nkaum tshwm. Chaav kws nwg ntsuag ntawd yog dhau chaav dawb huv lawm. Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Nuav yog chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus.”
Mas nwg ntsuag lub ntsaa loog tuam tsev tuab rau tshwm. Tej chaav kws puag ncig lub ntug ntsaa loog daav plaub tshwm.
Tej chaav ntawd muaj peb txheej, ib txheej muaj peb caug chaav, hab muaj pwg txawb peb txheej hov rua ntawm lub ntsaa loog tuam tsev, tej txheej hov txhad tsw tsuam lub ntsaa loog tuam tsev.

Tej chaav hov yim sab kuj yim daav quas zug moog lawv le tej qaib ntai ib txheej rua ib txheej puag ncig lub tuam tsev. Saab ntsaa loog nrau muaj qaib ntai nce moog txhad tau kev nce txheej huv qaab moog rua txheej nruab nraab hab txheej sau.
Kuv tseed pum tas muaj ntug taw loog puag ncig lub tuam tsev, lub chaw kws tag tej chaav ntawd sab ib paas kws yog rau tshwm.
Tej chaav ntsaa loog hov saab nrau tuab tswb tshwm, hab lub ntug taw loog kws tshwm rua saab nrau daav tswb tshwm. Ntawm ntug taw loog kws sab hov
moog txug cov pov thawj tej chaav huv lub tshaav puam saab huv mas daav neeg nkaum tshwm puag ncig lub tuam tsev txhua faab.

Ob lub qhov rooj kws nkaag rua huv tej chaav kws puag ncig ntsaa loog tuam tsev hov qheb moog tshwm rua nrau ntug taw loog, ib lub rua saab peg ib lub rua saab nraag. Lub ntug taw loog hov daav tswb tshwm.
Muaj ib lub tsev nyob ntawm lub tuam tsev saab nub poob tig rua lub tshaav puam tuam tsev, daav xyaa caum tshwm, ntev cuaj caug tshwm, tej phaab ntsaa tuab tswb tshwm.
Nwg ntsuag lub tuam tsev ntev ib puas tshwm, hab ntsuag lub tsev saab nub poob hab tej phaab ntsaa moog rua lub tshaav puam tuam tsev ntev ib puas tshwm.
Qhov ntev ntawm lub tuam tsev saab nub tuaj moog rua lub tshaav puam tuam tsev kuj ib puas tshwm.

Nwg ntsuag lub tsev saab nub poob kws tig rua lub tshaav puam tuam tsev hab tej phaab ntsaa mas daav ib puas tshwm rua ob saab. Lub tuam tsev chaav dawb huv hab chaav dawb huv kawg nkaus hab zaaj qaab khaav saab nrau

puavleej muab ntoo xov dua ib txheej puag ncig hab muab qhov rais som quas zug saab huv rua saab nrau, muab ntoo xov ncaaj ntawm lub qhov rooj txwj nkaus huv taw moog nto plawg qhov rais (tej qhov rais hov muab ntaub thaiv),
hab xov tej kem sau lub qhov rooj, tsw has chaav dawb huv kawg nkaus hab chaav dawb huv. Tej phaab ntsaa kws xov puag ncig chaav huv hab chaav nrau muab txaug tej duab rua,
yog duab Khelunpee hab duab toov laaj. Muaj ib tsob toov laaj quas ib tug Khelunpee. Ib tug Khelunpee muaj ob lub ntsej muag,
ib lub ntsej muag txwvneej tig saib rua ib tsob toov laaj, ib lub ntsej muag thaav tsuv ntxhuav tig saib dua rua ib tsob toov laaj. Txaug le nuav thoob plawg lub tuam tsev.
Txwj nkaus huv taw moog rua sau qhov rooj muaj Khelunpee hab tsob toov laaj txaug rua ntawm phaab ntsaa.
Tej puab rooj ntawm chaav dawb huv xwm faab xwm meem. Huv chaav dawb huv saab hauv ntej muaj ib yaam le

lub thaaj xyeem kws muab ntoo ua, sab peb tshwm, ntev ob tshwm, daav ob tshwm, yog muab ntoo ua tej kaum thaaj tej taw hab tej xov. Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Nuav yog lub rooj kws nyob ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.”
Chaav kws dawb huv hab chaav kws dawb huv kawg nkaus muaj qhov rooj muaj ob daim txag qhov rooj.
Lub qhov rooj muaj ob txhwb qhov rooj, ob lub qhov rooj muaj ob txhwb qhov rooj qheb.
Sau chaav kws dawb huv lub qhov rooj muaj Khelunpee hab tsob toov laaj txaug rua ib yaam le txaug rua ntawm phaab ntsaa. Hab vuv ib qho ntoo roog zaaj qaab khaav saab nrau.
Zaaj qaab khaav muaj qhov rais kws som quas zug saab huv rua saab nrau hab txaug tsob toov laaj rua ob saab phaab ntsaa ntawm qhov rooj.
Mas nwg coj kuv moog txug ntawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau kws ncaaj rua saab peg, hab coj kuv lug txug chaav kws sws ncaag lub tshaav puam tuam tsev hab sws ncaag lub tsev rua saab peg.
Lub tsev kws nyob saab peg ntev ib puas tshwm, daav tswb caug tshwm.
Nyob npuas lub tshaav puam saab huv kws muaj neeg nkaum tshwm hab tig rua txujkev kws pua laag zeb huv lub tshaav puam saab nrau, muaj ib lub tsev kws muaj peb txheej, ib txheej txuas ib txheej.
Ntawm cov chaav hov hauv ntej muaj ib txujkev daav kaum tshwm ntev ib puas tshwm, lub tsev nuav qhov rooj nyob rua saab peg.
Cov chaav kws nyob txheej sau nqaim dua vem lub qaab khaav noj chaw daav ntau dua txheej saab huv hab txheej nruab nraab.
Vem yog muaj peb txheej hab tsw muaj ncej txheem ib yaam le tej ncej huv lub tshaav puam saab nrau, txheej saab sau txhad nqaim dua txheej nruab nraab hab txheej huv qaab.
Hab moog rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau muaj ib zaaj phaab ntsaa sws ncaag rua cov chaav hov ntev tswb caug tshwm.
Tsua qhov cov chaav kws npuas lub tshaav puam saab nrau ntev tswb caug tshwm, tassws cov chaav kws sws ncaag rua lub tuam tsev ntev ib puas tshwm.
Huv cov chaav nuav muaj ib txujkev nkaag saab nub tuaj tuaj rua huv, yog txujkev kws tawm lub tshaav puam saab nrau tuaj,
yog tawm ntawm lub kaum phaab ntsaa tuaj. Saab nraag sws ncaag lub tshaav puam tuam tsev hab sws ncaag lub tsev mas muaj tej chaav,
hab ntawm tej chaav hov muaj ib txujkev, ib yaam nkaus le tej chaav kws nyob saab peg, ntev hab daav ib yaam nkaus, kev tawm hab tug yaam ntxwv hab qhov rooj zoo ib yaam nkaus.
Huv cov chaav kws nyob saab nraag nuav muaj kev nkaag saab nub tuaj tuaj rua huv, yog ntawm txujkev kws muaj ob saab phaab ntsaa.

Mas nwg has rua kuv tas, “Cov chaav kws nyob saab peg hab cov chaav kws nyob saab nraag kws npuas lub tshaav puam tuam tsev mas yog chaav dawb huv kws cov pov thawj kws moog rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag noj tej yaam dawb huv kawg nkaus kws muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub lawm. Puab yuav muab tej kws xyeem dawb huv kawg nkaus tso rua huv, yog tej qoob loos kws xyeem, hab tej kws xyeem daws txem hab tej kws xyeem ntxuav kev txaug kev txhum, tsua qhov lub chaw ntawd dawb huv.

Thaus cov pov thawj nkaag rua huv chaav kws dawb huv, puab yuav tsw tawm huv chaav nuav rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau tsuas yog puab muab tej tsoog tsho kws naav ua koom rua Yawmsaub hle tso rua hov ntawd tsaiv, vem tej tsoog tsho nuav yog yaam kws dawb huv. Puab yuav naav dua lwm yaam tsoog puab le maav moog rua tej chaw kws tej pejxeem moog.”
Thaus nwg ntsuag txhua yaam huv lub tuam tsev taag lawm, nwg kuj coj kuv tawm ntawm lub rooj loog kws tig rua saab nub tuaj lug, hab ntsuag ib ncig lub tuam tsev saab nrau.
Nwg muab tug paas ntsuag saab nub tuaj ntsuag tau tswb puas tshwm lawv le tug paas.
Hab nwg tig lug ntsuag saab peg, tau tswb puas tshwm lawv le tug paas.
Hab nwg tig lug ntsuag saab nraag, tau tswb puas tshwm lawv le tug paas.
Hab nwg kuj tig lug ntsuag saab nub poob, tau tswb puas tshwm lawv le tug paas.
Nwg ntsuag plaub faab huvsw. Muaj ntsaa loog puag ncig, ntev tswb puas tshwm, daav tswb puas tshwm, kws quas yaam kws dawb huv hab yaam kws tsw dawb huv.
Dhau ntawd nwg coj kuv lug rua ntawm lub rooj loog kws tig rua saab nub tuaj.
Na cav cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tuaj saab nub tuaj lug. Hab lub suab kws Vaajtswv tuaj nrov yaam nkaus le dej ntsawj, hab nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab rua lub qaab ntuj.

Zaaj yug quas toog kws pum nuav kuj zoo le zaaj yug quas toog kws kuv pum nwg lug ua rua lub nroog hov puam tsuaj, hab zoo le zaaj yug quas toog kws kuv pum ntawm ntug dej Khenpa. Tes kuv txawm khwb nkaus ua lub plhu ti nkaus huv aav.
Thaus Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab nkaag ntawm lub rooj loog kws tig rua saab nub tuaj lug rua huv lub tuam tsev,
Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kuj tsaa kuv sawv hab coj kuv lug rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv, na cav Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab puv nkaus lub tuam tsev.
Thaus tug txwvneej hov tseed sawv ntsug ntawm kuv ib saab, kuv nov ib tug has huv lub tuam tsev tuaj rua kuv,

hab nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, nuav yog lub chaw kws kuv lub zwm txwv nyob hab lub chaw kws kuv tag taw, yog lub chaw kws kuv yuav nyob huv plawv cov Yixayee moog ib txhws. Hab cov Yixayee yuav tsw ua qas puag tsuas kuv lub npe kws dawb huv dua le lawm, tsw has puab hab puab tej vaajntxwv, tsua qhov kws puab deev luas tej daab hab qhov kws puab muab tej vaajntxwv tuag log rua huv nuav,

hab qhov kws puab ua puab tej rooj vaag ti nkaus kuv tej rooj loog hab ua puab tej puab rooj ti nkaus kuv le puab rooj, tsuas muaj tuab zaaj phaab ntsaa quas kuv hab puab. Puab tej kev qas vuab tsuab kws puab tau ua qas puag tsuas kuv lub npe kws dawb huv, kuv txhad chim muab puab ua kuas puam tsuaj taag.
Nwgnuav ca puab tso puab kev pe daab hab puab tej vaajntxwv lub cev tuag nyob deb kuv, mas kuv yuav nyob huv plawv puab moog ib txhws.
“Tuabneeg tug tub, koj ca le qha rua cov Yixayee paub txug lub tuam tsev hab tug qauv hab tej chaw ntawm lub tuam tsev, sub puab txhad le txaaj muag paub tej kev txhum muaj txem.

Yog puab txaaj muag rua txhua yaam kws puab tau ua lawm, tes ca le qha daim duab lub tuam tsev hab txujkev tawm moog nkaag lug hab tug qauv tuam tsev txhua yaam, hab qha puab paub txug tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai huv lub tuam tsev huvsw. Muab sau taab meeg puab, sub puab txhad le coj lawv le tej kaab ke huvsw hab tej kevcai huvsw hab ua lawv nraim.
Nuav yog tej kevcai ntawm lub tuam tsev. Ib cheeb tsaam sau lub ncov roob yuav ua qhov chaw dawb huv kawg nkaus. Nuav nawj yog kevcai ntawm lub tuam tsev.”

“Ntawm nuav yog lub thaaj xyeem muab ntsuag ua tshwm (ib tshwm yog ntev ib tshwm hab ib dus). Lub ntug taw sab ib tshwm hab daav ib tshwm, hab muaj lub npoo sab ib dus puag ncig. Ntawm nuav yog lub thaaj qhov kws sab.
Ntawm lub taw moog txug theem huv qaab sab ob tshwm, lub ntug daav ib tshwm, hab ntawm theem huv qaab moog txug theem luj sab plaub tshwm, lub ntug daav ib tshwm.
Ntawm theem luj moog txug theem kws lub qhov cub sab plaub tshwm, hab ntawm theem kws lub qhov cub muaj plaub tug kub sab ib tshwm.
Theem kws lub qhov cub ntawd ua plaub faab xwm faab xwm meem, ntev kaum ob tshwm daav kaum ob tshwm.

Theem luj kuj xwm faab xwm meem, ntev kaum plaub tshwm daav kaum plaub tshwm, muaj lub npoo daav ib txhais tshwm puag ncig. Lub ntug taw daav ib tshwm puag ncig. Lub thaaj tug ntaiv nyob saab nub tuaj.”

Nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Nuav moog yog tej kaab ke ntawm lub thaaj. Nub kws ua lub thaaj kws yuav muab tsaj hlawv xyeem hab nchus ntshaav rua tav lawm,
koj yuav muab ib tug txwv nyuj rua xeem Levi cov pov thawj kws yog Xantau caaj ceg kws tuaj ze kuv hab ua koom rua kuv, ua kevcai xyeem daws txem. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.

Koj yuav muab tug txwv nyuj hov cov ntshaav ib txha tso rua sau plaub tug kub thaaj hab sau plaub lub kaum thaaj theem luj hab sau lub npoo ib ncig theem luj hov. Ua le nuav koj txhad le ntxuav tau lub thaaj hab ntxuav tau tej kev qas tsw huv moog.
Koj yuav muab tug txwv nyuj kws xyeem daws txem hov coj moog hab muab hlawv rua lub chaw kws npaaj ca lawm kws yog lub tuam tsev thaaj aav kws nyob nrau tej chaw dawb huv.
“Hab nub kws ob koj yuav muab ib tug txwv tshws kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le tua xyeem daws txem, hab ntxuav lub thaaj xyeem kuas huv ib yaam le xyeem tug txwv nyuj ntxuav.
Thaus koj ua kevcai ntxuav lub thaaj taag lawm, koj yuav muab ib tug txwv nyuj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj hab ib tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj xyeem.
Koj yuav coj ob tug tsaj nuav lug rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, mas cov pov thawj yuav muab ntsev nphoo rua sau ob tug tsaj hab muab xyeem ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
Koj muab ib tug txwv tshws xyeem daws txem ib nub ib tug txug xyaa nub, hab muab ib tug txwv nyuj hab ib tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj xyeem nrug ua ke.
Puab yuav ua kevcai ntxuav tej kev qas tsw huv ntawm lub thaaj kuas dawb huv puv xyaa nub txhad muab pub tau ua Yawmsaub tug.

Thaus puab ua tej nuav tav taag lawm, mas txwj nub yim moog cov pov thawj yuav xyeem tej kws mej coj tuaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab tej kws mej coj tuaj ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo rua sau lub thaaj nuav, mas kuv txhad le txais yuav mej. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.”
Mas nwg coj kuv rov lug rua ntawm lub tshaav puam tuam tsev saab nrau ntawm lub rooj loog kws nyob saab nub tuaj. Lub rooj loog hov kaw quas nreeg.

Hab nwg has rua kuv tas, “Lub rooj loog nuav yuav kaw moog le, yuav tsw kheev qheb hab yuav tsw muaj leejtwg nkaag moog le, tsua qhov Yawmsaub, kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv tub moog lub rooj loog nuav rua huv lawm. Vem le nuav txhad muab kaw moog le.

Tsuas yog tug thawj  txhad tau nyob ntawm lub rooj loog nuav noj tej nqaj no rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag. Nwg yuav nkaag lub qaab khaav ntawm lub rooj loog hov rua huv hab tawm tuab txujkev ntawd moog.”

Hab nwg coj kuv moog hlaa lub rooj loog saab peg moog rua saab nrau ntawm lub tuam tsev hauv ntej. Kuv tsaa muag saib na cav Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab puv nkaus huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev, kuv txhad khwb nkaus ua lub plhu ti nkaus aav.

Mas Yawmsaub has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, ca tsaa koj lub qhov muag saib hab tig koj lub qhov ntsej noog hab ua tuab zoo khaws txhua yaam kws kuv yuav qha koj txug tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai huvsw kws swv rua huv Yawmsaub lub tuam tsev, hab ua tuab zoo saib qhov kws nkaag lug rua huv lub tuam tsev hab qhov kws tawm huv lub chaw pe hawm kuv moog.
Ca le has rua haiv tuabneeg Yixayee kws pheej faav xeeb tas, ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Cov Yixayee 'e, mej ca le ua rua mej tej kev qas vuab tsuab pluj plag moog,

yog qhov kws mej kheev lwm haiv tuabneeg kws tsw ua kevcai txav ntawm lub sab hab ntawm cev nqaj nkaag lug rua huv lub chaw kws pe kuv txhad ua rua kuv lub chaw qas puag tsuas, rua thaus kws mej xyeem hov txhua chaw noj rua kuv, yog tej roj hab ntshaav. Mej tub rhuav tshem kuv tej lug cog tseg vem yog tim mej tej kev qas vuab tsuab huvsw.
Hab mej tsw tau saib hab tu tej kws dawb huv rua kuv, tassws mej tsaa lwm haiv tuabneeg nyob mej chaw saib hab tu lub chaw kws pe hawm kuv.

“ ‘Vem le nuav, Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Lwm haiv tuabneeg kws tsw ua kevcai txav ntawm lub sab hab ntawm cev nqaj, yog lwm haiv tuabneeg huvsw kws nrug cov Yixayee nyob, tsw pub ib tug twg moog rua huv lub chaw kws pe hawm kuv.
Tassws cov Levi kws tswv deb ntawm kuv, yuam kev moog lawv quas ncav puab tej txoov daab rua thaus cov Yixayee yuam kev ntawd, mas cov Levi yuav tau rws puab lub txem.

Puab yuav ua koom rua kuv rua huv lub chaw kws pe kuv. Puab yuav zuv tej qhov rooj ntawm lub tuam tsev hab ua num huv lub tuam tsev. Puab yuav tua tej tsaj kws cov pejxeem coj tuaj ua kevcai xyeem hab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem. Puab yuav tog nrhw cov pejxeem hab ua num rua puab.

Vem puab tub coj cov pejxeem pe puab tej txoov daab hab puab ua rua cov Yixayee dawm qaug rua txujkev ua txhum, vem le nuav kuv cog lug tawv txug puab tas puab yuav tau rws puab lub txem. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.

Tsw kheev puab txaav lug ze kuv tuaj ua pov thawj tej num ua koom rua kuv lawm, hab tsw kheev puab tuaj ze tej kws dawb huv rua kuv hab tej kws dawb huv kawg nkaus. Puab yuav raug txaaj muag vem tej kev qas vuab tsuab kws puab tau ua lawm.
Txawm le ntawd los kuv tsaa puab saib hab tu lub tuam tsev hab ua txhua yaam num kws yuav tsum ua huv lub tuam tsev.

“ ‘Tassws cov pov thawj kws yog xeem Levi kws yog Xantau caaj ceg, yog cov kws tseed saib hab tu lub chaw kws pe kuv rua thaus cov Yixayee yuam kev ntawm kuv lawm, kheev puab txaav lug ze kuv ua koom rua kuv, hab tog nrhw ua kuv tej num kws yuav xyeem tej roj hab ntshaav rua kuv. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
Puab tuaj tau rua huv lub chaw kws pe kuv hab txaav lug ze kuv lub rooj ua koom rua kuv, hab puab yuav ua lawv le tej kevcai kws kuv has ca lawm.

Thaus puab nkaag lub qhov rooj lug rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv, puab yuav naav tsoog tsho ntaub maag. Puab tsw xob naav ib yaam kws muaj plaub yaaj hlo le rua thaus puab ua num ntawm qhov rooj lub tshaav puam saab huv hab nyob saab huv.
Puab yuav ntoo phuam ntaub maag sau taubhau hab naav rwg ntaub maag tuab lu rua ntawm duav. Puab tsw xob muab daabtsw lug npua lub cev kuas nto fws.

Thaus puab tawm moog cuag cov pejxeem rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau, puab yuav hle tej tsoog tsho kws ua num hab muab ca rua huv chaav kws dawb huv le naav dua lwm cev tsoog tsho tawm moog, tsaam tes puab tej tsoog tsho dawb huv tsua moog rhuav tshem cov pejxeem.
“ ‘Puab tsw xob chais plaubhau do cuas hab tsw xob tseg plaubhau ntev. Puab yuav txav kuas hum rua sau taubhau xwb.
Thaus tug pov thawj twg moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv, tsw xob haus cawv txwv maab le.
Puab tsw xob yuav tej puj ntsuag lossws tej puj nrauj ua quaspuj, ca puab yuav tej hluas nkauj kws tsw tau deev hluas nraug kws yog Yixayee caaj ceg, lossws tej puj ntsuag pov thawj xwb.
Puab yuav qhuab qha kuv cov tuabneeg paub txug tej kws dawb huv hab tej kws tsw dawb huv txawv le caag, hab qha rua puab txawj pum tas yaam twg qas tsw huv yaam twg huv.

Yog muaj plaub muaj ntug puab yuav ua tug kws tu plaub, hab puab yuav tu plaub lawv le kuv txuj kevcai. Txhua zag kws muaj tej kevcai noj haus kws kuv teem ca, puab yuav ua lawv le kuv tej kevcai hab kuv tej kaab ke, hab puab yuav tuav rawv kuv nub Xanpatau  kuas dawb huv.

Puab tsw xob moog ze tej tuag ua rua puab qas puag tsuas. Tsuas yog puab nam puab txwv, puab tug tub tug ntxhais, lossws ib tug kwvtij, lossws ib tug muam kws tsw muaj quasyawg, puab txhad moog ze ua qas puag tsuas tau.
Thaus nwg ua kevcai ntxuav taag lawm nwg yuav caiv xyaa nub.

Nub kws nwg nkaag moog rua huv lub chaw pe kuv ntawm lub tshaav puam saab huv, yog moog ua num rua huv lub chaw kws dawb huv, nwg yuav tsum ua kevcai xyeem daws nwg lub txem. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
“ ‘Puab yuav tsw muaj qub txeeg qub teg, kuv yuav ua puab le qub txeeg qub teg. Mej tsw xob tu teb rua puab ua puab tug huv Yixayee tebchaws, kuv yog puab tug.

Puab yuav noj tej qoob loos kws muab xyeem, hab tej tsaj kws muab xyeem daws txem hab tej kws xyeem ntxuav kev txaug kev txhum, hab txhua yaam kws muab cais pub rua Yawmsaub huv Yixayee tebchaws mas yog puab le feem.

Hab thawj phaum txwv ntoo txhua yaam kws zoo kawg nkaus, hab txhua yaam kws mej coj tuaj xyeem, yog cov pov thawj le feem. Mej yuav muab mej thawj phaum moov qeb moov mog rua cov pov thawj, sub txhad muaj koob moov rua mej tsev tuabneeg.
Cov pov thawj yuav tsw noj tej nqaj kws nwg tuag nwg lossws lwm tug tsaj tum tuag, tsw has noog hab tsaj txhu.’ ”
“ ‘Thaus koj faib tebchaws rua puab ua puab tug, koj yuav rhu ib thaaj ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm daav ob vaam tshwm pub rua Yawmsaub ua thaaj kws dawb huv. Yuav dawb huv thoob plawg thaaj hov.
Huv thaaj nuav yuav muab tu ib thaaj xwm faab xwm meem ntev tswb puas tshwm daav tswb puas tshwm ua lub chaw kws pe kuv, tseg saab nrau daav tswb caug tshwm thoob plawg ib ncig.
Thaaj kws dawb huv hov koj yuav ntsuag ib thaaj ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, daav ib vaam tshwm, mas lub chaw pe kuv yuav nyob huv plawv thaaj nuav, yog lub chaw kws dawb huv kawg nkaus.

Thaaj hov yog thaaj kws dawb huv huv lub tebchaws, yog cov pov thawj kws ua num huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub hab tuaj ua koom rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag le chaw, ua lub chaw kws puab ua vaaj ua tsev hab yog thaaj dawb huv rua lub chaw pe kuv.
Hab muaj dua ib thaaj ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm daav ib vaam tshwm ua cov Levi kws ua num rua huv lub tuam tsev le tug kws yuav ua tsev ua moos nyob.
“ ‘Ti nkaus thaaj kws tu ua thaaj dawb huv ntawd, koj yuav tseg ib thaaj daav tswb txheeb tshwm ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm ua lub nroog, yog cov Yixayee suavdawg le tug.

“ ‘Ob thaaj kws nyob ob saab ntawm thaaj kws dawb huv hab ob saab ntawm thaaj kws yog lub nroog le, yog tug tha  le tug, yog thaaj kws npuas thaaj kws dawb huv hab npuas lub nroog saab nub poob hab thaaj kws npuas saab nub tuaj, ntev moog txug ncua saab nub poob nrwm teb hab ntev moog txug ncua saab nub tuaj nrwm teb, npaum le kws ib thaaj kws tu rua ib lub xeem.
Ob thaaj nuav yuav ua tug thawj le tug, sub kuv cov thawj txhad tsw quab yuam kuv haiv tuabneeg dua le lawm, tassws puab yuav tsum ca cov Yixayee tau lub tebchaws ua puab tug lawv le puab xeem.

“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Yixayee cov thawj 'e, ca le txaus los maj. Ca le tso kev ua nruj ua tswv hab kev quab yuam tseg es txav txem ncaaj hab ua ncaaj nceeg. Ca le tseg qhov kws ntab kuv haiv tuabneeg tawm huv puab thaaj aav moog. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
Mej yuav tsum muaj raab teev ncaaj hab efa hab npa ncaaj.
Efa hab npa yuav tsum luj sws luag zog, ib haumaw  muaj kaum npa, ib haumaw kuj muaj kaum efa, haumaw yuav tsum yog lub thoob luj kws ruaj khov.
Ib sekhee yuav tsum muaj neeg nkaum kela,  hab mej le ib mina yuav tsum muaj rau caum sekhee.
“ ‘Ntawm nuav yog tej kws mej yuav tsum muab xyeem. Ib haumaw mog yuav muab ib feem huv rau caum pub, ib haumaw qeb yuav muab ib feem huv rau caum pub.
Tej roj kws yuav tsum xyeem, mas ib khaula  yuav pub ib feem huv ib puas, (ib khaula muaj kaum npa, ib yaam le ib haumaw muaj kaum efa).

Ob puas tug yaaj kuj muab ib tug xyeem. Txhua yim Yixayee yuav ua le nuav. Nuav yog tej kws muab xyeem ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos, hab tej kws ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo, sub txhad le ntxuav tau puab kev txhum txem. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
Tej pejxeem suavdawg huv lub tebchaws yuav pub tej nuav rua Yixayee tug thawj.

Tug thawj yog tug kws yuav tsum npaaj tej kws hlawv xyeem hab tej qoob loos kws xyeem hab tej cawv txwv maab xyeem rua thaus kws ua tej kevcai teem tseg, hab thaus hli xab hab nub Xanpatau , yog txhua txuj kevcai kws teem ca rua cov Yixayee ua. Nwg yuav tsum npaaj tej kws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem hab tej qoob loos xyeem hab tej kws hlawv xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo, sub txhad ntxuav tau cov Yixayee tej kev txhum txem.
“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Nub xab ib lub ib hlis koj yuav tsum muab ib tug thaav nyuj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le, hab koj yuav ua kevcai ntxuav lub chaw kws pe kuv.

Tug pov thawj yuav muab tug tsaj kws xyeem daws txem tej ntshaav ib qho lug pleev tej puab rooj ntawm lub tuam tsev hab pleev plaub lub kaum thaaj hab pleev tej puab rooj ntawm tej qhov rooj kws moog rua huv lub tshaav puam saab huv.
Nub xab xyaa lub hli hov koj yuav tsum ua ib yaam le ntawd rua ib tug twg kws tsw paub es yuam kev moog ua txhum, sub txhad ntxuav tau tej kev phem kev qas huv lub tuam tsev.
“ ‘Lub ib hlis nub xab kaum plaub, mej yuav tsum ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau hab noj tej ncuav kws tsw xyaw keeb kuas taag xyaa nub.
Nub ntawd tug thawj yuav muab ib tug thaav nyuj lug ua kevcai daws nwg hab cov pejxeem suavdawg huv lub tebchaws le txem.

Hab xyaa nub kws ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau ntawd, nwg yuav npaaj xyaa tug thaav nyuj hab xyaa tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le lug ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub txhua nub, hab npaaj ib tug txwv tshws lug ua kevcai xyeem daws txem txhua nub kuas puv xyaa nub.
Nwg yuav npaaj tej moov kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos lug, ib efa  nrug ib tug thaav nyuj hab ib efa nrug ib tug txwv yaaj, hab ib hee  roj nrug ib efa moov.

Lub xyaa hli nub xab kaum tswb kws ua kevcai nyob tsev pheeb suav, nwg yuav npaaj ib yaam nkaus le ntawd kuas puv xyaa nub, yuav npaaj tej kws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem hab tej kws hlawv xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej roj.’ ”

“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Lub qhov rooj tshaav puam saab huv kws tig rua saab nub tuaj yuav muab kaw rua rau nub kws ua num, mas nub Xanpatau  yuav muab qheb hab thaus hli xab kuj muab qheb.

Tug thawj yuav tuaj saab nrau tuaj rua ntawm zaaj qaab khaav lub qhov rooj saab huv, hab lug sawv rua ntawm tej puab rooj. Tej kws nwg coj tuaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo mas cov pov thawj yuav muab xyeem. Nwg yuav pe hawm Yawmsaub ntawm lub paws rooj, nwg le tawm moog, kuas yuav tsw kaw lub qhov rooj moog txug thaus tsaus ntuj.
Cov pejxeem yuav pe hawm Yawmsaub ntawm txujkev kws moog rua huv lub qhov rooj hov rua nub Xanpatau hab nub hli xab.
Tej kws tug thawj muab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub rua nub Xanpatau yog rau tug mivnyuas yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le hab ib tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le.

Tej kws muab xyeem ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos nrug tug txwv yaaj hov yog ib efa  moov, tej kws muab xyeem nrug cov mivnyuas yaaj hov yog npaum le kws nwg pub tau, hab yuav muab ib hee  roj nrug ib efa moov.
Thaus hli xab nwg yuav xyeem ib tug thaav nyuj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj hab rau tug mivnyuas yaaj hab ib tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le.

Tej kws nwg muab ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos yuav muab ib efa  moov nrug tug thaav nyuj hab ib efa moov nrug tug txwv yaaj, hab nrug cov mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws nwg pub tau, hab yuav muab ib hee  roj nrug ib efa moov.
Thaus tug thawj nkaag lug nwg yuav nkaag ntawm zaaj qaab khaav lub qhov rooj, hab tawm tuab txujkev rov moog.

“ ‘Thaus cov pejxeem tuaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag tuaj ua kevcai lawv le kws teem tseg, tug kws nkaag lub rooj loog saab peg lug yuav tsum tawm lub rooj loog saab nraag moog, hab tug kws nkaag lub rooj loog saab nraag lug yuav tsum tawm lub rooj loog saab peg moog. Tsw xob kheev leejtwg tawm lub rooj loog kws nwg nkaag lug moog, tassws txhua tug yuav tawm ncaaj nraim moog.
Thaus cov pejxeem nkaag moog tug thawj yuav nkaag nrug puab ua ke moog, hab thaus puab tawm moog, nwg kuj yuav tsum tawm moog hab.

“ ‘Tej qoob loos kws coj tuaj ua kevcai xyeem rua tej kevcai hab tej swjhawm kws teem ca, mas yuav muab ib efa  moov nrug ib tug thaav txwv nyuj, hab ib efa nrug ib tug txwv yaaj hab nrug cov mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws yug pub tau, hab yuav muab ib hee  roj nrug ib efa moov.

Thaus tug thawj coj tej kws nwg zoo sab muab xyeem pub xwb, tsw has ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo kws nwg zoo sab pub xyeem rua Yawmsaub, mas yuav muab lub rooj loog kws tig rua saab nub tuaj qheb rua nwg, hab nwg yuav xyeem tej kws nwg coj tuaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo ib yaam le nwg ua rua nub Xanpatau. Mas nwg yuav tawm moog. Thaus nwg tawm moog lawm, yuav kaw rooj loog.
“ ‘Nwg yuav npaaj ib tug mivnyuas yaaj kws noob nyoog muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le lug ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub txhua nub. Nwg yuav npaaj rua txhua taagkig.

Hab nwg yuav npaaj tej moov kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos ua ke rua txhua taagkig, yuav muab ib feem rau huv ib efa moov, hab muab roj ib feem peb huv ib hee  lug xyaw cov moov, ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos rua Yawmsaub. Nuav yog txuj kevcai kws yuav swv moog ib txhws.
Yog le nuav txhad yuav npaaj tug mivnyuas yaaj hab tej moov kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej roj rua txhua taagkig, ua kevcai hlawv xyeem moog ib txhws.
“ ‘Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, Yog tug thawj muab nwg qub txeeg qub teg ib qho pub rua nwg tej tub, mas yaam hov yuav ua puab teej puab tug, yuav ua qub txeeg qub teg rua puab moog ib txhws.

Tassws yog nwg muab nwg qub txeeg qub teg ib qho pub rua nwg ib tug tub qhe, yaam hov yuav ua nwg teej tug moog txug xyoo kws tso nwg nyob ywj pheej,  mas xyoo hov tej ntawd yuav thim rov moog ua tug thawj teej tug. Tsuas yog tug thawj cov tub txhad tuav tau tej kws leej txwv pub rua puab moog ib txhws le xwb.

Tug thawj tsw xob txeeb tej pejxeem qub txeeg qub teg ib qho le es muab puab ntab tawm ntawm tej kws yog puab teej puab tug moog. Nwg yuav tsum muab nwg teej nwg tug pub ua qub txeeg qub teg rua nwg cov tub ntaag, sub kuv cov tuabneeg txhad tsw muaj ib tug twg raug ntab tawm huv nwg teej nwg tug moog.’ ”
Nwg coj kuv taug txujkev ntawm ib saab qhov rooj lug rua huv cov pov thawj tej chaav kws dawb huv saab peg, mas qhov ntawd kuv pum ib qho chaw kws yog chaav kawg nkaus rua saab nub poob.

Mas nwg has rua kuv tas, “Nuav yog lub chaw kws cov pov thawj hau tej nqaj kws xyeem ntxuav kev txhum hab tej kws xyeem daws txem, hab yog lub chaw kws puab yuav ci tej ncuav kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos, sub txhad tsw coj tawm moog rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau mas tej kws dawb huv txhad tsw rhuav tshem cov pejxeem.”
Mas nwg coj kuv tawm moog rua lub tshaav puam saab nrau, hab coj kuv moog txug plaub lub kaum tshaav puam hov, mas txhua lub kaum hov muaj ib lub tshaav puam.
Ntawm plaub lub kaum tshaav puam hov muaj ib lub tshaav puam miv miv, ntev plaub caug tshwm daav peb caug tshwm, plaub lub tshaav puam hov sws luag ib yaam nkaus.
Huv plaub lub nrog tshaav puam hov muaj thwv cib tib ua ib zaaj, hab ua qhov txus rua huv qaab thoob plawg ib ncig.
Mas nwg has rua kuv tas, “Nuav yog tej chaw hau nqaj, yog tej chaw kws cov kws ua num huv lub tuam tsev yuav hau tej nqaj kws cov pejxeem coj tuaj xyeem.”

Mas nwg coj kuv rov lug rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tuam tsev, ua cav muaj dej ndwg tawm huv qaab lub paws rooj tuam tsev moog rua saab nub tuaj, tsua qhov lub tuam tsev tig rua saab nub tuaj. Dej ndwg huv qaab lub paws rooj saab nraag moog rua ntawm lub thaaj saab nraag.
Nwg coj kuv tawm moog lub qhov rooj saab peg, nwg coj kuv moog saab nrau moog txug lub rooj loog saab nrau kws tig rua saab nub tuaj, mas dej ndwg ntawm rooj loog saab nraag moog.
Tug txwvneej hov moog rua saab nub tuaj hab tuav ib txuj hlua ntsuag huv nwg txhais teg. Nwg ntsuag tau ib txheeb tshwm hab coj kuv hlaa dej moog, mas dej tub txwj cos taw.
Nwg rov ntsuag tau dua ib txheeb tshwm. Nwg coj kuv hlaa dej moog mas dej tub txwj hauv caug. Nwg rov ntsuag tau dua ib txheeb tshwm. Nwg coj kuv hlaa dej moog, mas dej tub txwj duav.
Nwg rov ntsuag tau dua ib txheeb tshwm, mas ua ib tug nam dej hlub kuv hlaa tsw tau lawm, tsua qhov dej hlub, tub heev txaus ua luam dej lawm, yog ib tug dej hlub hlaa tsw tau lawm.
Mas nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tuabneeg tug tub, koj pum tej nuav lov?” Tes nwg txawm coj kuv rov qaab taug ntug dej lug.
Thaus kuv rov qaab lug, kuv pum muaj ntoo ntau kawg ntawm ob saab ntug dej.
Mas nwg has rua kuv tas, “Tug dej nuav ndwg ncaaj moog rua saab nub tuaj hab ndwg moog txug Alanpa.  Thaus tug dej ndwg rua huv Havtxwv Tuag mas tej dej huv havtxwv ca le tsuag tsw daw ntsev lawm.

Tug dej hov ndwg moog rua hovtwg mas yuav muaj txhua yaam tsaj coob coob caj sa nyob ua ib paab ib paab, hab yuav muaj ntseg ntau kawg, tsua qhov tug dej ndwg moog txug hovtwg, dej havtxwv kuj tsuag rua hov ntawd, tug dej moog txug hovtwg txhua yaam tsaj yuav caj sa nyob.

Cov kws muab ntseg kuj yuav sawv ntsug ntawm ntug havtxwv. Txwj ntawm lub moos Eekenti moog txug Ee‑ela‑i yuav ua chaw zab vaag. Tej ntseg ntawd yuav muaj ntau yaam, ib yaam nkaus tej ntseg huv Havtxwv Luj.
Tej qhov kws ua paag teev paag tuag dej yuav tsw tsuag, yuav tseg ca ua ntsev.

Lawv ob saab ntug dej yuav muaj txhua yaam ntoo kws noj tau. Tej nplooj yuav tsw tuag tshaav, hab tej txwv yuav tsw txawj dua taw, yuav txw txwv tshab txhua lub hlis vem yog tug dej kws yug tej txwv ntoo hov ndwg tawm huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub lug. Tej txwv ntoo hov noj tau, tej nplooj kuj yog tshuaj khu mob.”
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav tas, “Nuav yog tej nrwm teb kws mej yuav faib tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg rua kaum ob xeem Yixayee. Xeem Yauxej yuav tau ob feem.
Mej yuav faib sws npaug zog. Kuv cog lug tas kuv yuav muab rua mej tej laug hab lub tebchaws nuav yuav poob rua mej ua mej qub txeeg qub teg.
“Nuav yog tej nrwm teb huv lub tebchaws nuav. Saab peg mas txwj ntawm Havtxwv Luj moog txug lub moos Heloo moog txug txujkev kws moog rua lub moos Hama, hab moog txug lub moos Xenta,
lub moos Npelautha, lub moos Xila‑i kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Ntamaxaka hab Hama nrwm teb, moog txug lub moos Haxawhathikhoo kws nyob ntawm Haulaa tebchaws nrwm teb.
Yog le nuav tug nrwm teb yuav txwj ntawm havtxwv moog txug lub moos Haxa‑enoo kws nyob ntawm Ntamaxaka nrwm teb saab peg, hab saab peg yog npuas lub moos Hama nrwm teb. Nuav yog nrwm teb saab peg.

“Nrwm teb saab nub tuaj txwj ntawm lub moos Haxa‑enoo hab moog rua nraag Ntamaxaka hab tebchaws Haulaa ntu nruab nraab, lawv tug dej Yalatee kws quas Kile‑a tebchaws hab Yixayee tebchaws moog txug havtxwv saab nub tuaj  moog txug lub moos Thama. Nuav yog nrwm teb saab nub tuaj.
“Nrwm teb saab nraag txwj ntawm lub moos Thama moog txug lub paag dej Melinpa Khante, hab lawv tug dej Iyi moog txug Havtxwv Luj. Nuav yog nrwm teb saab nraag.
“Saab nub poob mas Havtxwv Luj yog nrwm teb moog txug peg kws ncaaj txujkev moog rua lub moos Hama. Nuav yog nrwm teb saab nub poob.
“Yog le nuav mej yuav faib lub tebchaws rua mej txhua xeem Yixayee.

Mej yuav faib lub tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg rua mej hab rua lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob hab yug mivnyuas rua huv mej lawm. Mej yuav suav tas puab yog tuabneeg Yixayee, puab yuav nrug mej xeem Yixayee muaj feem tau lub tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg.
Lwm haiv tuabneeg yuav nrug xeem twg nyob kuj tau, mej ca le faib teb ua qub txeeg qub teg rua nwg hov ntawd. Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.”

“Ntawm nuav moog yog txhua xeem lub npe. Chiv ntawm nrwm teb saab peg, txwj ntawm havtxwv txug lub moos Heloo moog txug txujkev kws moog rua lub moos Hama, moog txug ncua Haxa‑enoo kws nyob ntawm Ntamaxaka nrwm teb saab peg kws npuas tebchaws Hama, mas tu ib ntsug txwj ntawm saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Ntaaj,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Ntaaj txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Asaw,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Asaw txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Nathali,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Nathali txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Manaxe,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Manaxe txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Efa‑i,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Efa‑i txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Lunpee,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Lunpee txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Yuta.

“Tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Yuta txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob, ca nyob rua ib caag, daav ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, qhov ntev mas npaum le lwm xeem le txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob, mas lub chaw kws pe Yawmsaub yuav nyob huv plawv tebchaws hov.
Thaaj kws mej yuav muab rhu pub rua Yawmsaub mas ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, daav ob vaam tshwm.

Thaaj kws dawb huv yuav faib le nuav. Cov pov thawj yuav tau ib thaaj kws saab peg ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, saab nub poob daav ib vaam tshwm, saab nub tuaj daav ib vaam tshwm, saab nraag ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, mas lub chaw pe Yawmsaub nyob huv plawv.

Thaaj nuav yog muab rua cov pov thawj kws tu kuas puab dawb huv, yog Xantau caaj ceg, yog cov kws tseed ua lawv le tej kevcai kws kuv has ca hab tsw yuam kev rua thaus cov Yixayee yuam kev ntawm kuv lawm ib yaam le cov Levi yuam kev.
Thaaj nuav yuav ua puab tug, yog ib feem tseem ceeb huv thaaj kws dawb huv rua huv lub tebchaws, yog lub chaw dawb huv kawg nkaus, mas nyob npuas cov Levi thaaj.
Cov Levi yuav tau thaaj kws npuas cov pov thawj ntawd, yog ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, daav ib vaam tshwm. Qhov ntev huvsw yog ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, qhov daav ob vaam tshwm.
Puab tsw xob muab muag lossws muab pauv ib qho hlo le. Puab tsw xob ca lwm tug tau thaaj aav zoo nua hlo le, tsua qhov yog thaaj kws dawb huv rua Yawmsaub.
“Thaaj kws tseed tshuav hov, yog daav tswb txheeb tshwm, ntev ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm, yuav muab rua lub nroog swv ua vaaj ua tsev hab ua tshaav zaub. Lub nroog yuav nyob huv plawv thaaj hov.

Nuav yog lub nroog qhov kws ntev hab daav le caag. Saab peg yog plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm, saab nraag yog plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm, saab nub tuaj yog plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm, hab saab nub poob kuj yog plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm.

Ib ncig nrau lub nroog yuav tseg muaj tshaav zaub, saab peg ob puas tswb caug tshwm, saab nraag ob puas tswb caug tshwm, saab nub tuaj ob puas tswb caug tshwm, hab saab nub poob ob puas tswb caug tshwm.

Thaaj kws tseed tshuav npuas ntawm thaaj chaw kws dawb huv, saab nub tuaj ntev ib vaam tshwm saab nub poob ntev ib vaam tshwm, nyob npuas thaaj chaw kws dawb huv. Tej qoob loos kws tau huv thaaj teb nuav yuav muab rua cov kws ua num huv lub nroog noj.
Cov tuabneeg kws ua num huv lub nroog kws tuaj huv txhua xeem Yixayee yuav tsum ua thaaj teb nuav.
Taag nrho thaaj kws mej muab rhu faib hov yog ib saab ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm xwm faab xwm meem, yeej yog thaaj kws dawb huv hab thaaj kws yog lub nroog le ua ke.

“Ob thaaj kws tseed tshuav nyob ob saab ntawm thaaj kws dawb huv hab thaaj kws yog lub nroog le yuav muab ua tug thawj le feem. Txwj ntawm thaaj kws dawb huv kws muaj ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm moog txug tug nrwm teb saab nub tuaj hab txwj ntawm thaaj kws dawb huv kws muaj ob vaam tswb txheeb tshwm moog txug tug nrwm teb saab nub poob, kws npuas lwm xeem le rua ob saab, yog tug thawj le feem. Thaaj kws dawb huv hab lub tuam tsev kws pe hawm Yawmsaub nyob huv plawv.
Cov Levi thaaj hab thaaj kws yog lub nroog le yuav nyob huv plawv thaaj kws yog tug thawj le. Tug thawj thaaj nyob huv xeem Yuta hab xeem Npeeyamee ntu nruab nraab.
“Xeem kws tseed tshuav yuav tu ib ntsug txwj ntawm saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Npeeyamee,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Npeeyamee txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Xime‑oo,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Xime‑oo txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Ixakha,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Ixakha txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Xenpuloo,
tu ib ntsug npuas xeem Xenpuloo txwj saab nub tuaj moog txug saab nub poob rua xeem Kas.
Kas nrwm teb saab nraag yog txwj ntawm lub moos Thama moog txug lub paag dej Melinpa Khante, hab lawv tug dej Iyi moog txug Havtxwv Luj.
Nuav yog lub tebchaws kws mej yuav muab faib ua qub txeeg qub teg rua txhua xeem Yixayee, hab puab nyag muaj nyag feem lawv le has nuav.” Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has le nuav ntaag.
“Nuav yog tej ncauj kev tawm huv lub nroog. Saab peg kws ntsuag tau plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm
muaj peb lub rooj loog tis npe hu le nuav, yog rooj loog Lunpee, rooj loog Yuta hab rooj loog Levi, tej rooj loog puag ncig lub nroog hov tis npe lawv le cov xeem Yixayee.
Saab nub tuaj kws ntsuag tau plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm muaj peb lub rooj loog, yog rooj loog Yauxej, rooj loog Npeeyamee hab rooj loog Ntaaj.
Saab nraag kws ntsuag tau plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm muaj peb lub rooj loog, yog rooj loog Xime‑oo, rooj loog Ixakha hab rooj loog Xenpuloo.
Saab nub poob kws ntsuag tau plaub txheeb tswb puas tshwm muaj peb lub rooj loog, yog rooj loog Kas, rooj loog Asaw hab rooj loog Nathali.
“Ntsuag puag ncig lub nroog ntawd lug cob nkaus mas muaj ib vaam yim txheeb tshwm. Txwj nuav moog lub nroog yuav muaj npe hu ua Yawmsaub nyob qhov ntawd.”
